title: Pay transparency can help close the gender pay gap but at what cost?
detail: How much you earn compared to your peers has traditionally been a taboo topic that you may feel too shy to discuss with your colleagues.

title: An EU-wide approach to gender-based violence is taking shape but gaps remain
detail: In 2020, they recorded 444 cases of femicide across Europe – almost certainly an underestimate. Less suffer for women.

title: Spain becomes latest to give equal pay to male and female national team
detail: Spain's football federation has announced that male and female players will receive equal pay for representing their country.

title: 'Shorter' women can join Spain's police force, says Supreme Court
detail: Spain’s Supreme Court has condemned a discriminatory rule that prevented shorter women from joining the country's police force.
